title: Be worthy of your fathers! (Soviet poster, 1968)
Text: Be worthy of your fathers! Never forget the deeds of Soviet soldiers during the Great Patriotic War [text on paper]
Additional Information: Shows a soldier kissing his Kalashnikov against a photo of an earlier soldier kissing his rifle during the Second World War. The top image is taken from a photograph by Mark Markov-Grinberg, an official army photographer during the war
